To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private UniqueThreeRiver _uniquethreeriver;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_uniquethreeriver = UniqueThreeRiver(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_uniquethreeriver.IsReady)
{
    var current = _uniquethreeriver.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.uniquethreeriver = self.UniqueThreeRiver(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.uniquethreeriver.IsReady:
    current = self.uniquethreeriver.Current.Value
